content.text: Besalisks were a humanoid sentient species. They were notable for their four arms and inflatable wattle and could average in height between 1.88 and 2.36 meters. The Besalisk species was generally associated with the Galactic Republic.

Dexter Jettster was a Besalisk who, after his days working as a prospector in the Outer Rim, lived on the planet Coruscant where he owned and operated Dex's Diner. He was also an old friend of Obi-Wan Kenobi.Pong Krell was a Jedi General during the Clone Wars known for his ruthless tactics and disregard for the lives of the clone troopers under his command. He would betray both the Jedi Order and the Republic before he was killed by one of his soldiers.
